FAQ / Wave 5 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Master Sword

  1. If an effect puts a Weapon directly onto the battlefield without playing it, can I put Master Sword on a character that didn't have a Weapon? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. As long as you're not playing Master Sword, its first ability won't apply.
  2. If one of my characters has an Armor or Utility in its Weapon slot, can I play Master Sword to upgrade that character? [Source: WotC]
    No. In order to play Master Sword, it must replace a Weapon in that slot.
